properties.description: Store spinner call update spinner event
properties.name: _callUpdateEvent

properties.description: Set that spinner is a form element               Value: spinner
properties.name: _formElement

properties.description: Spinner automatically get focus when page loads               Default: false
properties.name: autofocus

properties.description: Value of the element when the element is reseted, if will also be the value of the element if no value is provided
properties.name: default

properties.description: Space that occupy the spinner inside parent container.              By default, its size adapts to its content              Values can be: true or false              Default: true
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Whether the element meets the requirements or not
properties.name: invalid

properties.description: Spinner maximum number value               Value must be int number               Default: valueless
properties.name: max

properties.description: Spinner minimum number value               Value must be int number               Default: valueless
properties.name: min

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the spinner               Default: false
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Text to be shown for the element
properties.name: tooltip

methods.description: Check that value is not greater than maximum
methods.name: _checkMax

methods.description: Check that value is not less than minimum
methods.name: _checkMin

methods.description: Set blur functionality to spinner element and to spinner input
methods.name: _inputBlur

methods.description: Set focus functionality to spinner element and to spinner input
methods.name: _inputFocus

methods.description: Set listener for update the spinner value
methods.name: _setFocusingListeners

methods.description: Set listener for focus and blur
methods.name: _setFocusingListeners

params.description: Whether the value key will be the private or the public one
params.name: privateValueKey

methods.description: Resets the value of the element to the default one, if no default is provided then empties the value
methods.name: reset

methods.description: Updates the description value for the
methods.name: updateDescription

methods.description: Updates the description value for the
methods.name: updateDescription
